name: Hades, King of the Underworld
description:
A story about the world? Yes yes, we know one" This is how the journey of the artists to show their vision about the Greek gods and their forms begin. 

---------------------------------------

This is my Brazilian version of the god Hades, the Lord of the Underworld.  Coming from a psychedelic dimension this deity is the Lord of the dead.  This representation brings with it his Helm of Invisibility, a magical object forged especially for this god by the Cyclopes, and which grants its wearer incredible powers.  The three-headed dog Cerberus could not be left out of a psychedelic version of Olympian.  Anyway, a very fun representation of this God.
